title: Door County Beer Festival | Events & Festivals | Destination Door County
text: Door County Beer Festival - About Thyme Farm - Baileys Harbor, WI 54202 A celebration of craft beer in an idyllic country setting at About Thyme Farm in Baileys Harbor. Enjoy unlimited tastings of more than 150 craft beers from throughout the Midwest, plus street food from Door County chefs, live music and FREE shuttles to and from the event. Enjoy it all at About Thyme Farm, a 150 year-old farmstead and barn.? About Thyme Farm 8425 County F Baileys Harbor, WI 54202 General Admission:? $55 Early Admission Tickets:? $75 Designated Driver:? $15 Plan Your Trip Check Lodging Availability Destination Guide Plan every exciting detail of your trip with Door County's annual Destination Guide!
